+package com.oracle.tools.fx.monkey.media;
+
+import java.net.URL;
+
+/**
+ * The notes are copied from Ensemble8 project.
+ */
+public class Notes {
+    public static String getNoteURI(String name) {
+        URL u = Notes.class.getResource(name);
+        return u == null ? null : u.toExternalForm();
+    }
+}

+/**
+ * Encodes user selection of which APIs to use for obtaining text shapes.

+    /** Selects the LayoutInfo API */
+    LAYOUT_INFO,
+    /** Selects the legacy (buggy, deprecated) Text/TextFlow methods */
+    LEGACY,
+    /** Selects the new methods in TextFlow that account for padding/border.  Not applicable to Text */
+    NEW
